dr.evomodel.treelikelihood
Class SequenceErrorModel

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.AbstractModel
      dr.evomodel.treelikelihood.TipStatesModel
          dr.evomodel.treelikelihood.SequenceErrorModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Model, ModelListener, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
public class SequenceErrorModel
extends TipStatesModel

This class incorporates uncertainty in the state at the tips of the tree and can be used to model processes like sequencing error and DNA damage. It can have a fixed (per site) base error rate and/or a time dependent error for which the probability of no error decays over sampling time exponentially with a given rate. This model is inspired by a brief description in Joe Felsenstein's book 'Inferring phylogenies' (2004: Sinauer Associates) and was elaborated on for DNA damage in Rambaut et al (2008, MBE

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Andrew Rambaut
